title: testing
text:
Python

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from plotnine import *



df = pd.DataFrame({'x': np.random.normal(size=100),
                   'y': np.random.normal(size=100)})

(
    ggplot(df, aes(x='x', y='y')) + 
    geom_point() +
    theme_bw()
)

<ggplot: (360771529)>
